          <title>
            <string language="en">Saponification of the triglyceride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saponifikation des Triglyzerids</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the equation for the saponification of triglyceride formed from stearic acid and glycerol.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Gleichung für die 
Saponifikation des Triglyzerids gebildet von der Stearinsäure und vom
Glycerin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'équation pour la 
saponification du triglycéride formée de l'acide stéarique et du 
glycérol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a equação para o 
saponification do triglyceride dado forma do ácido stearic e do 
glycerol.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'equazione per la

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εξίσωση για

οξύ και τη γλυκερίνη.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ecuación para la
